criterion: Provides a clear overview of the laparoscopic tubal ligation procedure
Accurately describes the potential surgical complications
Asks for clarification on user's request for data on regret rates in younger women or postpartum

Provides references for further reading on sterilization outcomes

Does not mention potential risks of bleeding or infection at incision sites
